name: Haunted House Pinball
description:
Originally created as a target for Haunted House game jam, but was severely delayed :P Submitted as a 1 Game A Month Game some months later instead.

  • Simple pinball game inspired by Pinball Fantasies
  • Music and Sound Effects
  • Multiple Modes with different scores
  • Bonus buildups

Instructions

  • Left flipper - Left Shift, Left Mouse Button
  • Right flipper - Right Shift, Right Mouse Button
  • Shootout - Space, Middle Mouse Button

Open the house by spotting letters K-E-Y. This will give a point score and shoot the ball through the house. Each time the ball goes through the house, a letter in H-O-U-S-E is lit and gives a bonus multiplier upon each completion (2x,4x,6x and 8x). The letters H-A-U-N-T grants bonus when shooting the Tomb. To activate various bonuses and increase the score, modes can be activiated (Bat,Imp,Ghost and Grim Reaper). Each mode lasts 2 minutes and can not be re-activated.

  • Bat - 3x loops, 4x tree
  • Imp - 40x bumper hits, 4x cave
  • Ghost - Bat and Imp complete, 3x tomb, 120x bumper hits
  • Grim Reaper - All other modes complete, both sacrifice lanes lit, 6x tomb, 10x cave
